member.name: M:Cocon90.Db.Common.Db.GetDataHelper(System.String)
member.summary:
Gets the data helper.
If MySQL DB providerName is "Mysql" dbConnString like "Server=127.0.0.1;Port=3306;Database=world;Uid=root;Pwd=123456;"
If MsSql DB providerName is "SqlServer" dbConnString like "Server=127.0.0.1;Port=3306;Database=world;Uid=root;Pwd=123456;"
If Sqlite DB providerName is "Sqlite" dbConnString like "Data Source=${app}\\testdb.db3"

member.name: M:Cocon90.Db.Common.Db.GetDataHelper(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Gets the data helper.
If MySQL DB dbType is "Mysql" dbConnString like "Server=127.0.0.1;Port=3306;Database=world;Uid=root;Pwd=123456;"
If MsSql DB dbType is "SqlServer" dbConnString like "Server=127.0.0.1;Port=3306;Database=world;Uid=root;Pwd=123456;"
If Sqlite DB dbType is "Sqlite" dbConnString like "Data Source=${app}\\testdb.db3"
